response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. The product, which I am confident you will find invaluable, is currently valued by me at $1,200,000. This represents an exceptional investment, considering its worth to you is estimated at $1,500,000.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase. I am more than happy to provide additional information or answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
